duties_responsibilities.duty: Repair and maintenance of critical systems such as switchgear, generators, UPS systems, power distribution equipment, chillers, cooling towers, computer room air handlers, building monitoring systems, etc.
Manage routine and emergency services on critical systems
Establish performance benchmarks, conduct analyses, and prepare reports on critical facility operations and maintenance
Responsible for on-site management of shift technicians, sub-contractors, and vendors

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering or relevant discipline helpful, not required.
